mdRecord.dcterms:title: WSLS-TV reporter Bill Walker interviews Bill Cox, coach of the Virginia Sailors minor league football team, about the Sailors' agreement with the Washington Redskins
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Bill Cox, coach of the Virginia Sailors minor league football team, tells WSLS-TV reporter Bill Walker about his team's relationship with the Washington Redskins. The Virginia Sailors signed a working agreement with the National Football League team, but new coach Vince Lombardi is hesitant about the contract. Cox says this is because the last team that Lombardi coached, the Green Bay Packers, had a similar agreement with the Hartford Knights team that did not work well due to the geographic distance. Cox remains optimistic that the two teams will reach an agreement.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Minor league football
